scripts.build:landing: npm run sync-content && cd projects/landing && npm run build
scripts.build:app: npm run sync-content && cd projects/frontend && npm run build
scripts.deploy:landing: npm run build:landing && firebase deploy --only hosting:landing
scripts.deploy:app: npm run build:app && firebase deploy --only hosting:app
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:landing && npm run build:app && firebase deploy --only hosting
